item.title: VPNs and Age-Verification Laws: What You Need to Know
item.description: Age-verification laws are on the rise around the world, and VPNs promise to get around them. But do they actually work?

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Veo 3 Comes to Google Photos, and Garmin Adds Satellite Comms to a Watch
item.description: Plus: The Polar Loop looks a lot like the Whoop band, JBL’s comically massive speakers are ready to party, and ExpressVPN splits its subscription plan into three tiers.

item.title: VPN use soars in UK after age-verification laws go into effect
item.description: Proton VPN sign-ups originating in the UK increased by over 1,400 percent.

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about the future of free expression online.
